trans-unit.source: Represents progress data reported in an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Representa os dados de progresso comunicados numa operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: This class contains properties that describe progress for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe contém as propriedades que descrevem o progresso para a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, e <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: Not every property in this class applies to each event.
trans-unit.target: Nem todas as propriedades desta classe aplica-se para cada evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A> and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A> represent the total number of bytes downloaded to date and the total number of bytes in the download operation, respectively; they apply to all three events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A>e <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A>representam o número total de bytes transferidos para a data e o número total de bytes na operação de transferência, respetivamente; estas são aplicadas a todos os eventos de três.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A></xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A> names the file group corresponding to the current <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> event, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> reflects the current stage of the download operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A>os nomes de grupo de ficheiros que correspondem a atual <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>evento, e <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A>reflete a fase atual da operação de transferência.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged></xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes already downloaded by this operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de bytes transferidos por esta operação.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, the BytesCompleted property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, a propriedade BytesCompleted refere-se para a transferência do manifesto de implementação.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, a propriedade refere-se o progresso da transferência da atualização todo, incluído os ficheiros de dados, assemblagens e manifestos.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, a propriedade se refere ao progresso da transferência do conjunto completo de ficheiros que fazem parte do grupo nomeado.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> representing the data already transferred, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int64>que representa os dados já transferido, em bytes.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes in the download operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número total de bytes na operação de transferência.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, the BytesTotal property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, a propriedade BytesTotal refere-se para a transferência do manifesto de implementação.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, a propriedade refere-se o progresso da transferência da atualização todo, incluído os ficheiros de dados, assemblagens e manifestos.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, a propriedade se refere ao progresso da transferência do conjunto completo de ficheiros que fazem parte do grupo nomeado.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> representing the total size of the download, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int64>que representa o tamanho total da transferência, em bytes.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the file group being downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do grupo de ficheiros que está a ser transferido.

trans-unit.source: You can initiate multiple calls to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> and download multiple file groups simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: Pode iniciar vários chamadas para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>e transferir a vários grupos de ficheiros em simultâneo.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use Group to determine which event callbacks correspond to which group.
trans-unit.target: Grupo utilizado para determinar as chamadas de retorno de evento corresponder à qual o grupo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the file group, if the event occurred as the result of a call to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>; otherwise, a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do grupo de ficheiros, se o evento ocorreu em resultado de uma chamada para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>; caso contrário, uma cadeia de comprimento zero.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the action that the process is currently executing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a ação que o processo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState"></xref> value, stating what element or elements the operation is currently downloading.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState"> </xref> valor, a indicar que um elemento ou elementos a operação está a transferir.
